Methods in escjava.translate with parameters of type Spec
static void DefGCmd.addInvConds(FindContributors scope, Spec spec)
           
static GuardedCmd GetSpec.surroundBodyBySpec(GuardedCmd body, Spec spec, FindContributors scope, javafe.util.Set syntargets, java.util.Hashtable premap, int locEndCurlyBrace, boolean nobody)
          Returns a command that first does an assume for each precondition in spec, then does body, then checks the postconditions of spec, and finally checks the modifies constraints implied by spec.
